dcterms:creator: Marcus Hutter
dcterms:description: The Wikipedia dataset is used for predicting the next character in text drawn from the Hutter prize Wikipedia dataset, focusing on character-level language modeling.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia dataset

dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin
Jean Wu
Jason Chuang
Christopher D. Manning
Andrew Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST) dataset is used for sentiment analysis, classifying one-sentence movie reviews as positive, negative, or neutral.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)

dcterms:creator: Mitchell Marcus
Beatrice Santorini
Mary Ann Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset is used for word-level language modeling, containing articles from the Wall Street Journal.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB)
